## LESSONS LEARNED

**What Worked Well:**

- Merging strategy preserved best elements from both versions
- Analogies make abstract concepts accessible
- War stories provide real-world context and urgency
- Metacognitive prompts encourage deep reflection
- Error prediction exercises build debugging skills
- Confidence calibration promotes accurate self-assessment

**Production Patterns Emphasized:**

- Token economics and cost optimization
- State management in stateless systems
- Error handling with specific exception types
- System prompt design for domain expertise
- Context management for long conversations

**Key Insight:**
Chapter 7 is the foundation for all AI engineering. Every pattern introduced here (tokens, roles, state, errors) appears in every subsequent chapter. The enhanced version ensures students master these fundamentals before moving forward.
